Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is highly valued by many of our customers. It offers exceptional quality and functionality that can significantly enhance your daily routine. Considering its value and benefits, I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $75. This is an exclusive offer tailored for potential buyers like yourself who appreciate top-notch products. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the difference it can make. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with your purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
